document_data.mainbody:
Dressed to the Nines was a mens clothing store and haberdashery that was found in Swordspoint neighborhood of the Temple District within the city of Ravens Bluff. They maintained a high exclusivity and the stores owner, the haughty Jordan Whipt, preferred to cater to the nobility of the city.
The store specialized in the sale of custom-ordered uniforms. Many adventurers and rogues would use the stores services as a source of disguises, much to Jordans irritation.
The store featured a signboard that displayed a Ravenian soldier standing at full attention. The Nines doorman wore matching attire.
